keywords.value: Armory Show, The International Fair of New Art (NYC)
keywords.name: subject

byline.original: By JOANNA NIKAS and SAMANTHA STARK

lead_paragraph: Young artists challenged the status quo with their installations in the defunct post office at Moynihan Station, and the New York art establishment mingled at the Armory Show on the Hudson Piers.
snippet: Young artists challenged the status quo with their installations in the defunct post office at Moynihan Station, and the New York art establishment mingled at the Armory Show on the Hudson Piers.
